dogs.name: Buddy
dogs.description: A friendly and loyal companion who loves long walks and playing fetch. Great with families!

dogs.name: Charlie
dogs.description: Playful and energetic pup who enjoys outdoor adventures and making new friends.

cats.name: Whiskers
cats.description: Curious and affectionate cat who loves to explore and cuddle. Perfect lap companion!

rabbits.name: Snowball
rabbits.description: Fluffy and energetic bunny who loves hopping around and munching on fresh veggies.
